title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
message:
Sometimes the MacBook starts up and works fine, some other times it boot loops and shows lines on the screen, board looks clean, could this be a bad GPU?

If it was a bad GPU any good sources for getting good NEW chips?

title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
message: Any reference for the lines on the screen? Could be screen or GPU depending on symptoms

title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
message: If same issue on external monitor, then GPU, or vRAM...

title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
message: Well right now the MacBook is not starting up any more, it turns on but after about 10-30 seconds after the chime it restarts and repeats.

title: MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
MacBook Pro Retina Mid 2015 820-00143 GPU issues?
message: Ordered new chip, lets see how it goes
